title: KDB-X Documentation - KDB-X Documentation
text:
# KDB-X Home

Welcome to the home of KDB-X technical documentation.
KDB-X is the next generation of the kdb+ ecosystem for real-time, data-intensive, and AI-driven applications at scale. Built on kdb+, an industry-leading analytics technology for relational data processing both in memory and on disk, KDB-X is powered by the array-based, functional language q. This architecture enables high performance and low-latency analytics across structured, unstructured, and time-series data.
Get KDB-X!

## Ready to dive in?
